page.title: 09LEISURE IN LYVEDEN 2
page.content:
{ BIRD WATCHING CONT'D
The bird watchers observe a variety of different birds, ranging from herons to partridges. Other types of wildlife include two types of deer - Fallow and Chinese water deer.
{ SOCIAL ACTIVITIES
There are not many social activities that go on in Lyveden as it is not heavily populated. There is an annual bonfire party which is held at the Manor. We are told that this is very enjoyable, but couldn't see for ourselves because the survey work was being done in July! Perhaps we'll be more successful in 2086!
